name: Eatmobmod
description:
Hello everyone this is codecraft the creator of this mod at the moment

So what is this mod about

this mod lets you(the player) eat other mobs

every wonder how that creeper would taste me neither but now you can see how it taste

Of course, if you want to eat them you will have to kill them and then cook them

 

there is a 30% chance of the mob except ender dragon dropping their self

once you have one of those open the crafting table click the mob you want in edible form

From Creeper to ender dragon we have all the mob that your heart and Minecraft stomach desire 

 

 

Bon Appetite
